subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Kevin Lennon, the National Collegiate Athletic Association vice president, said in a telephone interview that the N.C.A.A. had been making unannounced visits to schools to research their legitimacy.
snippet: Kevin Lennon, the National Collegiate Athletic Association vice president, said in a telephone interview that the N.C.A.A. had been making unannounced visits to schools to research their legitimacy.
